title: @Riot Is there a future Swain skin coming soon?
body:
I'm not a Swain main or anything, but my friend who is a Swain main said the last time a Swain skin came out was 23rd of may, 2012.

Proof: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Swain/SkinsTrivia          
> Use the arrow keys you fruitloops

Give him some love Riot
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:50}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 






p.s Nerf Omen
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Meanwhile, {{champion:81}} has had a skin every year for the last 5 years. 
_(and theres been only 1 year since he came out that he didn't get a skin in)_

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZGUK2v0Y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-22T11:15:25.936+0000)
>
> Meanwhile, {{champion:81}} has had a skin every year for the last 5 years. 
> _(and theres been only 1 year since he came out that he didn't get a skin in)_

Indeed
